

/* BEGIN VARS Autogenerated */ 
define variable item as character format "x(8)" no-undo.  
define variable cantidad as decimal init 1.0 format "->,>>>,>>9.9<<<<<<<<<" no-undo.  
define variable um as character init "KG" format "x(8)" no-undo.  
define variable precio as decimal init 0.0 format "->,>>>,>>9.9<<<<<<<<<" no-undo.  
define variable cust as character format "x(8)" no-undo.  
define variable oferta as logical init true no-undo.  
define variable entrega as date init "31/07/2020" format "dd/mm/yyyy" no-undo.  
/* END VARS Autogenerated */ 

/* BEGIN TemporalTable Autogenerated */ 
define temp-table tt_ItemStock no-undo 
   field Id as character format "x(8)"
   field Cantidad as decimal init 0.0 format "->,>>>,>>9.9<<<<<<<<<"
   field almacen as character init "0.0" format "x(8)"
   field site as character init "0.0" format "x(8)"
   field caducidad as date init "07/30/2020" format "mm/dd/yyyy"
   field reservado as logical init false format "mm/dd/yyyy"
. 
/* END TemporalTable Autogenerated */ 
 
/* BEGIN INPUT Frame Autogenerated */ 
define frame VentaLinea 
   item label "Item" at row 6 column 32 
   cantidad label "Cantidad" at row 6 column 61 
   um label "Unidad de medida" at row 8 column 61 
   precio label "Precio" at row 8 column 32 
   cust label "Identificador Cliente" at row 4 column 31 
   oferta label "Descuento Verano (10%)" at row 10 column 34 
   entrega label "Fecha Entrega" at row 10 column 61 
with side-labels title "Orden de venta Línea". 
/* END INPUT Frame Autogenerated */ 
 
/* BEGIN OUTPUT Frame Autogenerated */ 
define frame ItemStock 
   Id label "Identificador Item" 
   Cantidad label "Cantidad" 
   almacen label "Almacén" 
   site label "Estantería" 
   caducidad label "Fecha Caducidad" 
   reservado label "Reservado" 
with title "Artículos en Stock". 
/* END OUTPUT Frame Autogenerated */
